comments.text:
If the app shuts down, we don't handle upload chunking all that well. From bug 615284 comment 3:

  We should get the changedIDs from the engine (which probably uses the tracker,
  but it might not in the future) and add them to the tracker at the beginning of
  the Sync. Then, as we fetch items in batches, we can remove successfully
  fetched items from the tracker (in batches, too).

comments.text: We do track remaining changes at the end of the sync (https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/babf96cf0c37b608e9663e2af73a4d21819c4af1/services/sync/modules/engines.js#1970-1979), but, if the app is forcibly shut down after we've pulled everything from the tracker, but before we finish the sync, those changes won't be saved for the next sync.
